"Intensive Training at the Skyscape":
"As expected, you have come <%me>
What do you think about the floating continent?
As the height level difference is intensive and
significant, this is a location where you need to
distinguish the near and the remote. You need to
perform warfare tactical training over here for
the Samurai! It is the real deal once you have
cleared Very Hard at S rank?
*Clear at S-Rank for Very Hard and above,
travelling with Azanami only."
"浮遊大陸で特訓しちゃうよ！"

"やっぱり来てくれたね！
じゃあ<%me>
今度は浮遊大陸なんかどう？
高低差が激しいから近接と遠隔を使い分けて
どっちもうまくこなすブレイバーの
実戦訓練には、もってこいの場所！
そういうとこをベリーハードでＳランク
クリアしてこそ本物だと思わない？
※アザナミのみ同行、ブレイバー限定
ベリーハード以上、Ｓランククリア"
